@tool_tip.string: Flashes the chat toolbar button if a new nearby chat arrives. The nearby chat window must be docked to the conversations window and the conversations window must be closed for the button to flash.

@label.string: Flash chat toolbar button if a new IM arrives

@tool_tip.string: Flashes the chat toolbar button if a new (group) IM arrives. The IM window must be docked to the conversations window and the conversations window must be closed for the button to flash. This option is only available if IMs will be shown in tabs instead of separate windows (see "General" tab).

@label.string: Enable usage of chat bar as a command line

@tool_tip.string: Clears the Chat Transcript to prevent lag effects from chat spammers.

#text.string: Set the media url (usage: cmd url type)

@tool_tip.string: Sets and plays your media stream to the entered url

#text.string: Set the music stream url (usage: cmd url)

@tool_tip.string: sets and plays your music stream to the entered url
How big do you want the platform to appear to be?

#text.string: Get avatar name from key (usage: cmd key)
Roll dice (usage: cmd dice faces mt mv)

@tool_tip.string: Rolls dice - cmd [number of dice] [number of faces] [modifier type (optional)] [modifier value (optional)]. Example: cmd 1 20, cmd 2 40 + 5. Lack of parameters is equal to cmd 1 6 (standard die).

#text.string: Teleport within region (usage: cmd x y z)
Offer teleport to avatar (usage: cmd key)

@tool_tip.string: The syntax of this command allows partial names and is not case sensitive. Better results if used while the Radar is open.

#text.string: Teleport to region (usage: cmd regionname | x y z)
